title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Environment, Climate and
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Environment, Climate and 
Communications (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) 
Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 2 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited environment climate communication (alteration name department title minister) order 2025 (2) order come operation 2 june 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide and, in the 
English 
the Environment, Climate and 
Communications, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Aeráide, 
Fuinnimh agus Comhshaoil, and, in the English language, to that of the 
Department of Climate, Energy and the Environment. 

the Department of 

language,

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus 
Cumarsáide and, in the English language, the Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire 
Aeráide, Fuinnimh agus Comhshaoil and, in the English language, to that of the 
Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire comhshaoil aeraide agus cumarsaide english language minister environment climate communication altered irish language taire aeraide fuinnimh agus comhshaoil english language minister climate energy environment

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment –
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment – 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of the Environment, Climate and 
Communications shall be construed as references to the 
Department of Climate, Energy and the Environment, and 

references to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications shall be construed as references to the Minister 
for Climate, Energy and the Environment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [235] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

27 May, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
